project_name: Royal Commission Project, Contract 097 C76R-Auditorium Shade 2, Job Id 19 010-REZAYAT-2A
project_description: The Space frame represents a rectangular double layer structure, supported by fifteen short vertical steel supports. The Geometric line sketch illustrates the over-all geometry of the structure. Covering is to consist of sandwich panels supported over purlins connected to purlin stools at each top chord joint.
